GS26sarvmtsu:673: vedasya nityatve svataḥ prāmāṇye ca satyapi mantrārthavādabhāgasyopaniṣadbhāgasyetihāsapurāṇānāṃ cāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GS26sarvmtsu:685: pratyabhijñā ca prāgajñātaghaṭādisthāyyavagāhitvenānubhava evāntarbhavatīti grahaṇasmaraṇarūpeṇa dvairāśyameva jñānam |
GS26sarvmtsu:689: jātā tu vaiśeṣikādivajjaḍadravyaviśeṣo buddhyādidharmāśrayo 'ta eva dehādivilakṣaṇo nityo vibhurlokatrayaṃ karmavaśād bhraman pratyakṣādipramāṇakaḥ kartṛbhoktṛ(tva)
GS26sarvmtsu:694: tadviṣayatvena ghaṭaśca prakāśata iti tripuṭīpratyakṣavādī gururbhāṣate |
GS26sarvmtsu:703: asau mānāntarāyogyatvādapūrvamiti, kṛtisādhyatvāt kāryamiti, kṛtyuddeśyatvāt pradhānamiti cocyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:706: ato 'gniṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyasmin vākye yajetetyatra pratyayāṃśena liṅā niyogaḥ pratīyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:708: sa ca kasyacit kasmiṃścid viṣaye prasiddha iti yajatidhātulakṣaṇayā prakṛtyā viṣayaḥ,
GS26sarvmtsu:710: agniṣṭomeneti tṛtīyāśrutyā kasmin yāge niyoga iti viśeṣārpaṇam,
GS26sarvmtsu:715: arthavādāḥ phalaprāśastyaprakāśakā iti te 'pi tatsādhakaniyogacikīrṣāpādakatvād vidhiṃ pratyupakurvanti |
GS26sarvmtsu:722: na ca jñānāśrayasya dravyasya jñānādanyatvānna jñānasaṃbhedaḥ sambhavatīti vācyam |
GS26sarvmtsu:731: ato rajatānubhavasaṃskāravataḥ puṃsaḥ kācādikaraṇadoṣāt sādṛśyādiviṣayadoṣācca sitabhāsvaravastumātratayā idamitipra(ti)
GS26sarvmtsu:734: ayaṃ ghaṭa iti jñānasya ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyauttarakālikajñānena viṣayīkriyamāṇatvāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:740: na ca bhedidharmatve 'sya bhedāntarāpekṣādoṣaḥ, svaparanirvāhakatvopapatteḥ ātmavat |
GS26sarvmtsu:741: sa hi sarvaṃ vastu jānannātmānamapi jānāti |
GS26sarvmtsu:743: sā ca kiṃ kena kathaṃ vetyaṃśatrayavatī(pratīyāḥ?) |
GS26sarvmtsu:752: anayoḥ pakṣayorya ātmanaḥ svarūpāvasthitilakṣaṇo mokṣaḥ so 'pi karmaṇaiva labhyaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:755: nityanaimittikāni cānutiṣṭhataḥ prācīnāni śubhāśubhakarmāṇi ca phalabhogena kṣapayataśca yajamānasyāyatnato jñānamantareṇaiva svarūpāvasthitirbhavatīti |
GS26sarvmtsu:757: gurukumārayorasarvajñatve sarvajñatve vā nirīśvaraṃ viśvamiti vacanamaviśvāsyam |
GS26sarvmtsu:762: atha taistārkikābhimata īśvara eva nirasto nopaniṣadabhimataḥ kṣetrajñasvarūpabhūta iti cet |
GS26sarvmtsu:765: neśvara iti vadatāṃ vedasya dharmaikaniṣṭhato cābhyupagacchatāṃ kṣetrajñasvarūpasyeśvarasyākiñcitkaratvāt,
GS26sarvmtsu:767: anumānapramāṇakatvaṃ ca parameśvarasya svaireva nirastamāgamasya dharmaikaparatvaṃ ca sādhitamiti kiṃpramāṇakaḥ syāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:768: svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇo yo mokṣa uktaḥ, tatrāpi kimātmā prāk svarūpāvasthitaḥ , kiṃvā na |
GS26sarvmtsu:774: karmasādhyatve mokṣasya nityapuruṣārthatā ca na syāt, yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamiti nyāyāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:775: jaḍātmavāde kaivalyasya śūnyakalpatā cāparihāryā pāṣāṇakalpatā vāstheyā |
GS26sarvmtsu:779: jñeyaṃ ca tad jñānaṃ ceti virodhāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:782: ātmanyapyasiddhasya jñānasyārthaprakāśakatve arthasya jñānaprakāśakatāpi syād, aviśeṣāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:784: teṣāṃ ca buddhivṛttiviśeṣatvena jaḍatvānna svataḥ prakāśātmakatā saṅgacchata iti cidātmasānnidhyādeva tathātvamāstheyam |
GS26sarvmtsu:785: ''tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti''; iti śruteḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:789: kiñca sarvavastūnāṃ bhedo nāmaikaḥ, kiṃ vānekaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:793: dvitīye tvātmana eva bhedaśabdārthatāpattiḥ, ekasya sarvagatasyājaḍasya vastunastallakṣaṇatvāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:794: acetanaścet sa kiṃ bhedāntaramapekṣate , kiṃ vānāpekṣate |
GS26sarvmtsu:797: tasmāt svarūpatvena dharmatvena vā bhedo na nirvoḍhuṃ śakyaḥ śakreṇāpīti |
GS26sarvmtsu:813_0: iti śrutestasyāḥ pratijīvaṃ bhedaścāstīti yuge yuge mumukṣavo jīvā vāsudevasaṅkarṣaṇapradyumnāniruddhākhyacaturvyūhātmano
GS26sarvmtsu:816: ajñānīni bahūnyasaṃkhyavapuṣo jīvānmumukṣūnapi jñānājñānasamāśrayādanuyugaṃ teṣāṃ ca niḥśreyasam /
GS26sarvmtsu:822: nirguṇabrahmapradhānānāśaṅkarabhagavatpādādīnāmaupaniṣadānāṃ paurāṇikānāṃ ca ṣaḍvidhāṣṭavidhapramāṇavādināṃ paramārthataḥ saccidānandabrahmaikameva tattvam |
GS26sarvmtsu:824: pramātṛpramāṇaprameyātmakasya viśvasya tasmin kalpitatvena tataḥ pṛthagasattvāt,
GS26sarvmtsu:827: kiṃ punarbhāvā ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ, ātmaiva ced vastu |
GS26sarvmtsu:828: yadi ca so- 'khaṇḍātmā, kuto jagajjīveśvarātmakaṃ dvaitamavabhāsate |
GS26sarvmtsu:829: sa cenna vastu, na caikassaḥ, kutastarāṃ viśvaṃ bhāseta |
GS26sarvmtsu:830: na khalvekaṃ svaprakāśaṃ ca tattvamanapekṣyānekātmakasya jaḍasya viśvasya siddhiḥ sādhayituṃ śakyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:834: sā hi idami sitabhāsvaravastumātratvena jñātāpi svena rūpeṇājñātā satī rajatānubhavasaṃskāravataḥ puṃsaḥ svāvidyāvijṛmbhitarajatābhāsātmanā bhāsate |
GS26sarvmtsu:835: evamātmāpyahamiti prakāśadravyamātratvena jñāyamāno 'pi saccidānandātmakena svena rūpeṇājñātaḥ sannātmāvidyāvijṛmbhitajagajjīveśvarātmakaṃ bhedaprapañcamātmani paśyatīti |
GS26sarvmtsu:837: asmin pakṣe 'pi vyavahāradaśāyāṃ dṛg dṛśyaśceti dvau padārthau |
GS26sarvmtsu:859: iyameva kvacidavidyeti kvacit prakṛtiriti kvacidakṣaramiti kvacicchaktiriti kvacinmoha iti cocyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:860: (tadvata ātmanaḥ sakāśādākāśādīni pañca bhūtāni tebhyaścidātmādhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭiśarīrāṇi cotpadyanta iti vedāntinaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:861: paurāṇikāstu dvaitasya cādhiṣṭhānasattayeva śabdapratibhāsaḥ, yathā rajatasya |
GS26sarvmtsu:863: asmin pakṣe vyavahāradaśāyāṃ dṛg dṛśyaṃ ceti dvau padārthau |
GS26sarvmtsu:871: tebhyaḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpāṇi śarīrāṇi cotpadyanta iti vedāntinaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:877: jñānaśakteḥ sāttvikāhaṃkārād digādicaturdaśakaraṇadevatā antaḥkaraṇāni ca jāyante |
GS26sarvmtsu:879: tānyetāni mahadādyavanyantāni māyāvinā puruṣeṇa preritānyanyonyaṃ militvā haimaṃ brahmāṇḍamārabhante |
GS26sarvmtsu:880: tatra ca caturdaśa bhuvanāni carturvidhaśarīrāṇi ca bhavantīti,
GS26sarvmtsu:881: teṣu ca deheṣu sarvanidānabhūtaścidātmā sākṣitvenābhimānitvena praviśati |
GS26sarvmtsu:890: sarvakṣetreṣveka eva sthitaḥ san sarvānkṣetrajñānniyamayati ca |
GS26sarvmtsu:896: sa ca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'; ityādiśrutyā ātmadarśanamanūdya tatsādhanatvena śravaṇādividhānād,
